content: this pattern is for a basic lacy collar made on the basis of an adjusted chart image from pintrest and written down to be shared with whoever finds it interesting the pattern uses abbreviation but it is still very easy to make difficulty level easy appropriate for absolute beginners crochet terminology us gauge/gauge 8 row of 20 double_crochet stitches = 4 x 4 inches my other designs and patterns can be found here 2 and you can join me on instagram 1 to chat with me live and to follow my design process happy crocheting and i hope you enjoy it 1 https //www instagram com/muto_crochet/ 2 https //www etsy com/dk-en/shop/mutocrochetdesigns
